#### Load necessary libraries

```{r, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

```

#### Load in the data

Specify data paths

```{r}

krabi_path = "./data/krabi_data.xlsx"
nakorn_path = "./data/nakorn_data.xlsx"

```

Load in excel sheet data as list and rename list items

```{r}

krabi_list <- lapply(excel_sheets(krabi_path), read_excel, path = krabi_path)
names(krabi_list) <- (excel_sheets("./data/krabi_data.xlsx"))

nakorn_list <- lapply(excel_sheets(nakorn_path), read_excel, path = nakorn_path)
names(nakorn_list) <- (excel_sheets("./data/nakorn_data.xlsx"))

```
